text: Ibrahimale bhane ki â€˜â€˜allahabata tadhi'era timiharule juna murtiharula'i matra sansarika jivanako karana puja gardachau. Kiyamatako dina timiharu eka'arkabata inkara garnechau, ra eka'arkala'i dhikkarnechau, ra timiharu sabaiko basasthana narka hunecha ra timro kohi sahayata garnevala hunechaina
